entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Trim projection inside unused joins #28426
  • How to prohibit cross aggregate navigation properties? #28422
  • EFCore 6 Table Splitting regression bug with Project <Nullable>disable</Nullable> #28421

Closed

  • Filtered Includes for hidden navigation properties #27493
    7.0.0
  • Cascade processing calls local DetectChanges even if AutoDetectChangesEnabled is false #27389
    7.0.0-preview7

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/3.1' => 'main' #28428
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #28427
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Query: Entity splitting support for regular entities #28425
    auto-merge

Merged

  • Merging internal commits for release/3.1 #28423
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.28
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #28424
  • Allow use of EF.Property for Include #28411
  • Make Select_nested_collection_with_groupby have deterministic ordering #28410
    auto-merge
  • Don't call local DetectChanges in cascade processing if AutoDetectChangesEnabled is false #28402

Updated

  • Unidirectional many-to-many relationships #28371
    auto-merge
  • Json Columns initial work #28171
  • Fix scaffolding of reference navigations with NRT (#27616) #28382
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.9
  • Bump Microsoft.Data.SqlClient from 5.0.0-preview2.22096.2 to 5.0.0-preview3.22168.1 #28325
    blocked, area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • feat: validate reserve invalid file characters on migrations name #28367
